attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is our opinion that the launch of e-petitions in November 2006 has led to far too many people creating pointless petitions and filling our email with requests to sign them. The ease of use has led to far too many people signing them without really understanding the issues and creating a petition as a trend following. Stop them now! p.s. We understand this is slighlty ironic

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
